title: Bloomberg Markets: DeVaul on Opportunities in Expensive Market
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: DeVaul on Opportunities in Expensive Market
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Mark Devaul Equity Portfolio Manager Hennessy Equity and Income Fund Discussing the markets and investing stocks, including Berkshire Hathaway and Apple.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
